languages.text: Покойник будто вскипел изнутри, его плоть обратилась в месиво, но кожа удивительным образом не повредилась.
From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.
languages.original_text: Покойник будто вскипел изнутри, его плоть обратилась в месиво, но кожа удивительным образом не повредилась.

traits.locale_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.
From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.
From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.
From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.
From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.

languages.text: 在你看来，这个黑暗灵族的内脏不知道怎么被烧烂了。他的肉体已经化成了液体，但不知为何，他的皮肤依然完好无损。
languages.original_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.

traits.locale_text: 在你看来，这个黑暗灵族的内脏不知道怎么被烧烂了。他的肉体已经化成了液体，但不知为何，他的皮肤依然完好无损。

languages.text: So weit du das sagen kannst, wurde das Innere des Drukhari irgendwie zum Kochen gebracht. Sein Fleisch hat sich verflüssigt, doch aus irgendeinem Grund ist seine Haut intakt geblieben.
languages.original_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.

traits.locale_text: So weit du das sagen kannst, wurde das Innere des Drukhari irgendwie zum Kochen gebracht. Sein Fleisch hat sich verflüssigt, doch aus irgendeinem Grund ist seine Haut intakt geblieben.

languages.text: D'après ce que vous pouvez voir, les entrailles de ce Drukhari semblent avoir été bouillies, mais comment, vous ne sauriez le dire. Sa chair a beau s'être liquéfiée, sa peau, elle, est inexplicablement demeurée intacte.
languages.original_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.

traits.locale_text: D'après ce que vous pouvez voir, les entrailles de ce Drukhari semblent avoir été bouillies, mais comment, vous ne sauriez le dire. Sa chair a beau s'être liquéfiée, sa peau, elle, est inexplicablement demeurée intacte.

languages.text: Por lo que puedes ver, las entrañas del Drukhari han hervido. Su carne se ha licuado, pero de alguna manera su piel ha permanecido intacta.
languages.original_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.

traits.locale_text: Por lo que puedes ver, las entrañas del Drukhari han hervido. Su carne se ha licuado, pero de alguna manera su piel ha permanecido intacta.

languages.text: 見る限り、デュカーリの内臓は煮てあるようだ。肉は液状化しているのに、なぜか皮膚は無傷のままだ。
languages.original_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.

traits.locale_text: 見る限り、デュカーリの内臓は煮てあるようだ。肉は液状化しているのに、なぜか皮膚は無傷のままだ。

languages.text: Anladığın kadarıyla Drukhari'nin iç organları bir şekilde kaynamış. Eti sıvılaşmış ama nedense derisi olduğu gibi kalmış.
languages.original_text: From what you can tell, the Drukhari's insides were somehow brought to a boil. His flesh has liquefied, yet for some reason, his skin has remained intact.
